home.roomsDescription: Choose from our different categories of rooms or suites according to your taste or need to make your stay a unique experience.
home.spaDescription: Give yourself the pleasure of escaping the stress of city life. Visit Spa Pyramides and leave your relaxation in the hands of those who know. We offer you a wide variety of options for your relaxation.
home.experiencesDescription: We will make your stay in Mazatlán an unforgettable and pleasant visit. At Gaviana you can enjoy exclusive bars and themed restaurants, each one ready to welcome you and amaze you with its concept.

weSection.heroDescription: Inspired by the tranquility and harmony of the incomparable union between sand and sea, at Gaviana Resort we take your rest very seriously.
weSection.description: We are ready to serve you as you deserve. Whatever the reason for your visit: for work, vacation with friends, with family, romantic getaway, or if you just seek a moment to disconnect from real life, Gaviana Resort has it all.
weSection.experiencesTitle: A sea of experiences, a promise of well-being, a tribute to calm
weSection.experiencesDescription: We are committed to making your stay here a unique experience and an awakening of your senses.
weSection.backgroundTitle: Welcome to Gaviana Resort - Your beach paradise

experiencias.pageSubtitle: Discover the best of the Pearl of the Pacific with our recommendations to live unforgettable moments during your stay.
experiencias.centroHistoricoDesc: Just a walk away, discover the vibrant Plazuela Machado, epicenter of cultural life with cafes, galleries and live music.
experiencias.observatorioDesc: Discover the Pearl of the Pacific from the historic Observatory 1873, an unmissable cultural and visual stop near Gaviana Resort.
experiencias.olasAltasDesc: The Olas Altas Promenade awaits you with its bohemian and historical charm. Enjoy romantic sunsets over the Pacific, right where the waves break.
experiencias.acuarioDesc: Get ready for the deepest adventure! Just minutes from Gaviana Resort, the largest aquarium in Latin America awaits you. Dive without getting wet into the marine life of the Mexican Pacific.
experiencias.ctaDescription: Book your stay at Gaviana Resort and discover everything Mazatlán has to offer.
